titles.title: HP587 Lord, let your grace descend on those

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, let your grace descend on those
Who, hoping in your word,
This day do publicly declare
That Jesus is their Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
With cheerful feet may they advance,
And run the Christian race ;
And through the troubles of ;he way
Find all-sufficient grace.
